AGENT_BOTS.SIDEBAR_TXT:
Agent Bots

Agent bots allows you to automate the conversations

BOT_CONFIG.ERROR: Please enter your CSML bot configuration above
BOT_CONFIG.API_ERROR: Your CSML configuration is invalid, please fix it and try again.

BOT_CONFIGURATION.TITLE: Select an agent bot
BOT_CONFIGURATION.DESC: You can set an agent bot from the list to this inbox. The bot can initially handle the conversation and transfer it to an agent when needed.
BOT_CONFIGURATION.ERROR_MESSAGE: Could not update the agent bot, please try again later
BOT_CONFIGURATION.DISCONNECTED_ERROR_MESSAGE: Could not disconnect the agent bot, please try again later

CREATE.TITLE: Edit your bots details
CREATE.DESC: Edit title and description to your bot.

TEAMS.TITLE: Add team to bot - %{botName}
TEAMS.DESC: Add teams to your newly created bot. All the added teams will be notified when a conversation is assigned to this bot.

WIZARD.title: Bot details
WIZARD.body: Change name, description and other details.

WIZARD.title: Finish
WIZARD.body: You are all set to go!

CREATE.TITLE: Create a new bot
CREATE.DESC: Add a title and description to your new bot.

AGENTS.TITLE: Add teams to bot - %{botName}
AGENTS.DESC: Add teams to your newly created bot. This lets you collaborate as a bot on conversations, get notified on new events in the same conversation.

WIZARD.title: Create
WIZARD.body: Create a new bot of teams.

WIZARD.title: Finish
WIZARD.body: You are all set to go!

TEAM_FORM.ERROR_MESSAGE: Couldn't save the team details. Try again.

FINISH.TITLE: Your bot is ready!
FINISH.MESSAGE: You can now collaborate as a bot on conversations. Happy supporting
